info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 10:13AM EST until further notice by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Gaylordsville. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Moderate flood stage where water reaches Spring Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.4 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Mon 10 am: 8.0 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 8.3 Mon 7 pm 9.3 Tue 1 am 9.8 Tue 7 am 10.1 Tue 1 pm 10.3 Tue 7 pm 10.4 Wed 1 am 10.4 Wed 7 am 10.3 Wed 1 pm 10.2 Wed 7 pm 10.1 Thu 1 am 10.0 Thu 7 am 9.8 &&
